parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Host name of the mail server

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: The port number of the mail server

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Unique name the connection is identified by

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username used to connect with the mail server

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password to connect with the mail server

parameter.name: connectionType
parameter.description: Email connection type (protocol) that should be used to establish the connection with the server

parameter.name: readTimeout
parameter.description: The socket read timeout value

parameter.name: connectionTimeout
parameter.description: The socket connection timeout value

parameter.name: writeTimeout
parameter.description: The socket write timeout value

parameter.name: requireTLS
parameter.description: Whether the connection should be established using TLS

parameter.name: checkServerIdentity
parameter.description: Whether server identity should be checked

parameter.name: trustedHosts
parameter.description: Comma separated string of trust host names

parameter.name: sslProtocols
parameter.description: Comma separated string of SSL protocol

parameter.name: cipherSuites
parameter.description: Comma separated string of Cipher Suites

parameter.name: maxActiveConnections
parameter.description: Maximum number of active connections in the pool

parameter.name: maxIdleConnections
parameter.description: Maximum number of idle connections in the pool

parameter.name: maxWaitTime
parameter.description: Maximum time to wait for a pooled component to become available

parameter.name: minEvictionTime
parameter.description: The minimum amount of time an object may sit idle in the pool before it is eligible for eviction

parameter.name: evictionCheckInterval
parameter.description: The number of milliseconds between runs of the object evictor

parameter.name: exhaustedAction
parameter.description: The behavior of the pool when the pool is exhausted.

parameter.name: requireAuthentication
parameter.description: Whether authentication is required for SMTP server.
